1419720.name: Bloodlust Online
1419720.description:
A retro gothic horror roguelite MMO set in the 18th century. A vampiric universe where the long-living creatures started to replace their biologic parts with machine ones in order to be more powerful and reduce body damage, becoming android hybrids.

Play as your favorite android vampire with your friends online. Choose between different models, each one with different appearance, available weapons and play style.





Talk with the Cartomechanic to draw your first Tarot Card. Use it to summon your magitech Familiar. Each card provide an unique Familiar creature that will accompany you and shoot your enemies (or for, some models, cure your character).





Some places in the world of Bloodlust Online, like the Armandia Village, are bound to an endless curse: the massive castle of Countess Bathory, now a deadly bloodsucking machine, rises and the creatures starts to attack the innocent people. It is up to you to make way through these procedurally generated castles and destroy The Blood Countess.

Every time she is killed the curse restarts and the castles rebuilt, giving some time for the villagers to rest.



Beware: your death is permanent. Every time you die your character is infected by the Bathory virus and becomes her slave. Your next character will have to fight it in the same place to earn items and the previous tarot card.





The main influence of Bloodlust Online is the Castlevania series: the setting, the castles, the creatures and one of the goals to visit 100% of the maps. The game also draws inspiration on the Vampire Chronicles of Anne Rice to name some elements (like the Armandia, Lestatia with the Théâtre and Louisian Villages) and contents of the plot. Nier Automata is present giving the concept of shooting companions (and sword dwelling characters), android models and dead body rescue.
